file_content.text: Thank you for all your help. I'll send someone to collect my aunt before she volunteers for another mission.
Maelrich Alde wanted me to inform you that I'd destroyed the Rist transceiver, Captain.
I'm honored by your assistance, Master Jedi. I hope my aunt was not too much trouble.
Are you Captain Alethios? I destroyed House Rist's transceiver at your aunt's request.
I thank you, Master Jedi. I can't even imagine how you found my aunt, let alone how she convinced you to do this.
Captain, your aunt says I should tell you the Rist transceiver has been taken out.
Soldier, I don't know if I'm more shocked to hear that you've destroyed a Rist spy network, or that my aunt is alive.
Captain Alethios? Your aunt told me to let you know when I'd destroyed the Rist transceiver.
I beg your pardon? You did what, exactly? Wait--my aunt is alive?
I've had men trying to find her for days. If she had fallen into enemy hands....
You have struck a blow at our enemies' communications and protected the integrity of the Organa intelligence network. We owe you greatly.
I beg your pardon. I can't speak at present. I'm coordinating a search for a missing person.
